content.introduction:
Disallow duplicate class members
âœ…RecommendedUsing therecommendedconfig from@eslint/jsin aconfiguration fileenables this rule
Table of ContentsRule DetailsExamplesWhen Not To Use ItHandled by TypeScriptVersionResources
If there are declarations of the same name in class members, the last declaration overwrites other declarations silently.
It can cause unexpected behaviors.
classFoo{bar(){console.log("hello");}bar(){console.log("goodbye");}}constfoo=newFoo();foo.bar();// goodbye1234567Copy code to clipboard
